fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 135.35 points or 0.7% to settle at 19,517. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, tumbled 5.47% to 10.57. State Bank of India, Reliance Industries and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
